title: Mike Wilson: The Age of Fiscal Policy Dominance?
description: Although consensus sees long-term interest rates staying low, could a potential $2 trillion fiscal stimulus mean rates will rise more (and faster) than markets currently expect?
itunes:title: Mike Wilson: The Age of Fiscal Policy Dominance?
itunes:summary: Although consensus sees long-term interest rates staying low, could a potential $2 trillion fiscal stimulus mean rates will rise more (and faster) than markets currently expect?
